amendment.description: Amendment prohibited the use of funds to implement or enforce the threatened species listing of the Preble's meadow jumping mouse under the Endangered Species Act.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 48 printed in House Report 115-830 to prohibit the use of funds to implement or enforce the threatened species listing of the Preble's meadow jumping mouse under the Endangered Species Act.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Lamborn amendment (A044) Agreed to by recorded vote: 213 - 202 (Roll no. 349).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A044) offered by Mr. Lamborn.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
